name: 6th International Conference on Internet of Things (CIoT 2024)
content: 6th International Conference on Internet of Things (CIoT 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of IoT. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to.
